about_the_game:
Hello Again is a mysterious and cute adventure game about exploring ancient ruins to uncover the secrets of a mysterious time loop.

EXPLORE

Welcome to the lovely island of Mychaea! This tropical island has everything: towering temples, a run-down motel, dangerous mine shafts, unexplained arcane technology, and traces of light arson!

SOLVE

Keep a close eye on your clock, because these ancient ruins were built to shift throughout the day. Access doors while they're still open, explore tunnels before they cave in, and utilize perpetuum, a strange material which reacts strangely to the loop's effects.

CHAT

Talk with Stew, an up-and-coming singer-songwriter. Befriend Theodore, an exuberant ray of sunshine who makes up for his broken English with extreme confidence. Buy a time share from Gus, the island's sleaziest businessman. And try not to offend the nostrils of world-class perfumier Chauncey.

REPEAT

As a postal worker, you knew it was out of the ordinary to travel off-shore to hand-deliver a package to a famous archaeologist. But you didn't expect to shipwreck on your way over, and you really didn't expect to get stuck in an eternal time loop. All in a (never-ending) day's work...

name: Hello Again
short_description: Welcome to the world's coziest time loop! Hello Again is a puzzling adventure game set on an island filled with ancient ruins. Explore strange structures, solve clockwork puzzles, and befriend cute characters to uncover the island's secrets and break the loop.
